# Note with Block References

This paragraph has a block reference. ^block-123

## Section with Blocks

This is another block. ^block-abc

### Nested Section

And this is a nested block. ^block-xyz

## Table Block

| Name | Value | Status |
|------|-------|--------|
| Item 1 | 100 | Active |
| Item 2 | 200 | Pending |
